name: swarpc
description: Full type-safe RPC library for service worker -- move things off of the UI thread with ease!
author: Gwenn Le Bihan <gwenn.lebihan7@gmail.com>

scripts.version: kacl release && prettier -w CHANGELOG.md && git add CHANGELOG.md
scripts.typedoc:dev: nodemon --watch src --watch README.md --watch typedoc.json --watch typedoc.css --exec npm run typedoc:withplugins
scripts.typedoc:plugins: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const p=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('typedoc.json')).plugin||[];if(p.length)require('child_process').execSync('npm add --legacy-peer-deps -D '+p.join(' '),{stdio:'inherit'});else console.log('No plugins found');"
scripts.typedoc:withplugins: npm run typedoc:plugins && npm run typedoc
